name: Microsoft Teams App Templates
description:
Microsoft Teams App Templates offers a collection of templates for common app use cases and workflows inside Teams. Each template details various interaction states, responsive sizing, and desktop and mobile designs. Whether you’re a designer or a developer, feel free to grab an entire template to use in your UX, or modify templates as needed for your scenarios.


Templates included:


• Default app landing page

• Section titles

• List

• Dashboard

• Media Gallery

• Feed examples

• Form

• Sign in

• Task board

• Settings

• Calendar

• Calendar cards

• Wizard

• Apps with empty states


Visit Microsoft Teams UI Kit and our documentation page for further information.
